tasks.title: Create Goal__c Object
tasks.description: Create a custom object 'Goal__c' with fields: Goal_Description__c (Text), Target_Date__c (Date), and Status__c (Picklist with values: Not Started, In Progress, Completed). Set sharing model to 'Private'.
acceptance_criteria: Goal__c object is created with specified fields
Sharing model is set to Private

tasks.title: Set Up Goal Creation Flow
tasks.description: Create a Flow named 'Goal_Creation_And_Update' that triggers on the creation and update of Goal__c records, validating required fields.
acceptance_criteria: Flow successfully validates all required fields upon Goal__c record actions

tasks.title: Configure Profile Permissions
tasks.description: Adjust the permissions for the Profile to allow Read, Create, and Edit access on the Goal__c object.
acceptance_criteria: Profile permissions for Goal__c are updated
Users with the Profile can access Goal__c without issues

tasks.title: Design Goal Page Layout
tasks.description: Create a custom page layout for Goal__c that includes fields: Goal Description, Target Date, Status, and related Contact lookup for better visibility.
acceptance_criteria: Page layout is created and assigned

tasks.title: Conduct Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Test the complete setup: create new Goal__c records through the UI, verify the Flow works correctly and that the permissions apply as expected.
acceptance_criteria: New Goal__c records can be created and updated successfully

key_risks: Misconfiguration of Flow validation rules leading to incorrect Goal records
Profile permissions not applied correctly affecting user access
Page layout not displaying as intended causing confusion for end users
success_criteria: Successful creation and update of Goal__c records through the UI
Users report no access issues to Goal__c
Flow operates without error while validating required fields
